channel.title: CelestialCraft Faction PVP [1.3] [Hosted 24/7] [Shops] [McMMO] [Griefing&Raids]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g3Alj.jpg[/img]
CelestialCraft
176.227.201.202:25581 About: You searched for a Faction PvP server? You've come to the right place! CelestialCraft offering you a great game exprience in Faction PvP server. Always try to be the best and the stronger faction in the server, by getting the best armor and sword! We have two worlds, the one the spawn in and one for survival, the survival has PVP on and there you can get materials and fight, also there's a arena inside the city where you can PVP there with other players, "The Strong One Survives" arena, you can't just run, you need to kill all then you can go. Our team doing his best to improve the game spirit for the players and serve you the best that we could. If you have any suggetsions to improve the server it will be great, we are waiting for you guys!
Vote here every 24 hours to get 2 diamonds!: http://www.planetmin...ver/celestialmc Vote here every 20 hours to get 2 diamonds!: http://mcserverlist....3e6af21b10002b6
We hope you'll come, we are waiting!

item.description:
@edeneden1871 wrote:

g3Alj.jpg1440×838

CelestialCraft

176.227.201.202:25581
About:
You searched for a Faction PvP server? You’ve come to the right place!
CelestialCraft offering you a great game exprience in Faction PvP server. Always try to be the best and the stronger faction in the server, by getting the best armor and sword!
We have two worlds, the one the spawn in and one for survival, the survival has PVP on and there you can get materials and fight, also there’s a arena inside the city where you can PVP there with other players, “The Strong One Survives” arena, you can’t just run, you need to kill all then you can go.
Our team doing his best to improve the game spirit for the players and serve you the best that we could.
If you have any suggetsions to improve the server it will be great, we are waiting for you guys!

Vote here every 24 hours to get 2 diamonds!:
http://www.planetmin…ver/celestialmc
Vote here every 20 hours to get 2 diamonds!:
http://mcserverlist…3e6af21b10002b6

We hope you’ll come, we are waiting!
